title: CRYSTAL SHOW
description: Hydor decorations are produced with non-toxic, super safe resins which have no impact on the natural biological balance of the aquarium. The hand painted colours are water resistant and do not release any kind of substance. Ideal for both marine and fresh water aquariums.
cleaned_text: - Aquarium decoration, in the shape of a crystal - Made with non-toxic resins - Safe, does not affect the biological balance of the aquarium - Hand painted, resistant colours that do not release any kind of substance - Ideal for both fresh and marine water tanks Hydor decorations are produced with non-toxic, super safe resins which have no impact on the natural biological balance of the aquarium. The hand painted colours are water resistant and do not release any kind of substance. Ideal for both marine and fresh water aquariums.
